metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42890 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability in Batik of Apache XML Graphics allows an attacker to runJava code from untrusted SVG via JavaScript. This issue affects Apache XMLGraphics prior to 1.16. Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.16.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-42890` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbatik-java - 1.14-1ubuntu0.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: batik package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14-1ubuntu0.2').
